A C D E G I L M N R S T U V

R

registerEntity(Entity, int) - Method in class com.lambda.entity.EntityHandler
Registers the 'Entity' at the 'EntityHandler'.
registerState(GameState, int) - Method in class com.lambda.Game
Registers the 'GameState' 'state' with the ID 'id', so it can be used by the 'Game'.
removeEntity(int) - Method in class com.lambda.entity.EntityHandler
Removes an 'Entity' with the ID 'id' from the 'HashMap'.
removeState(int) - Method in class com.lambda.Game
Removes the 'GameState' specified by the ID 'id' from the list of registered 'GameStates' so it is not usable anymore.
render() - Method in class com.lambda.entity.Entity
Renders the 'Sprite'
render() - Method in class com.lambda.entity.EntityHandler
Calls the 'render()'-method for every 'Entity' in the 'HashMap'.
render() - Method in class com.lambda.Game
Calls the 'render()'-method for the currently active 'GameState'.
render() - Method in class com.lambda.GameState
Calls the 'render()'-method for all objects that need rendering to the screen.
render(float, float) - Method in class com.lambda.graphics.Sprite
Renders the 'Sprite' to the screen.
render(float, float) - Method in class com.lambda.graphics.SpriteSheet
Renders the whole 'SpriteSheet' to the screen.
render(float, float) - Method in class com.lambda.map.Map
Renders all 'Tiles' of the 'Map' in the order they are stored in the 'Map'.
render() - Method in class com.lambda.map.Tile
Renders the 'Tiles' 'Sprite' to the screen.
renderSprite(float, float, int, int) - Method in class com.lambda.graphics.SpriteSheet
Renders a certain 'Sprite' from the 'SpriteSheet' to the screen.
requestClose() - Method in class com.lambda.GameContainer
Requests a close from the 'GameContainer'.
